activityHistory.title: Account activity
activityHistory.label: Login history / safe operation history only shows your records of three months

googleAuth.title: Google Authenticator (Recommended)
googleAuth.description: Protect your account with Google Authenticator.

password.title: Login Password
password.description: Login password is used to log in to your account.

withdrawWhitelist.title: Withdrawal Whitelist
withdrawWhitelist.description: When this function is turned on, your account will only be able to withdraw to whitelisted withdrawal addresses.

antiPhishing.title: Anti-Phishing Code
antiPhishing.description: Protect your account from phishing attempts and ensure that your notification emails are from Piex only.

operation.title: Safe Operation History
operation.description: Manage action to executed on your account.

changePassword.tip: Minimum eight characters, at least one letter, one number and one special character.
changePassword.title: Change Password

validate.confirmNewPassword: Please enter the confirm new password

antiPhishing.hint_1: The anti-phishing code is a string of characters that you set yourself, which can help you identify websites and emails that are counterfeit Piex
antiPhishing.title_2: Where will the anti-phishing code appear?
antiPhishing.hint_2: When set, this code will be included in emails from Piex. Any other emails without this code are scams

form.label: Anti-phishing Code
form.rule_2: Anti-phishing code must be minimum 6 letters.
form.rule_3: Anti-phishing code must be maximum 32 letters.

validate.newPhoneCode: Please enter new Phone Number Verification Code

placeholder.newPhoneCode: Enter new Phone Number Verification Code

validate.code: Please enter new Email Verification Code

googleAuth.title: Link Google Authenticator
googleAuth.sub: Google Authenticator is a dynamic password tool that works like SMS dynamic verification. A dynamic verification code is generated every 30s after binding, and the verification code can be used for security verification of operations such as login, coin withdrawal, and modification of security settings.

item_1.title: Download Google Authenticator APP
item_1.sub: iOS users log in to the App Store to search for "Authenticator". Android users log in to the app store or use the mobile browser to search for "Google Authenticator".

item_2.title: Add a key and back up in Google Authenticator
item_2.sub_1: Open Google Authenticator, scan the QR code below or manually enter the following key to add a verification token.
item_2.sub_2: The key is used to retrieve the Google Authenticator when the phone is replaced or lost. Be sure to save the following key backup before binding.

item_3.title: Add a key and back up in Google Authenticator

item.label: Google Authenticator code
item.rule: Please enter the Google Authenticator code
